job_description:
About Computronix
Our low turnover rate, challenging work, great client relationships, and teamwork create a high morale environment with plenty of opportunities to innovate, grow in your career, and never get bored!
As a Sr. Software Developerat Computronix, you will work in a highly dynamic, energetic, fast-changing, and fluid work environment. You will contribute technical expertise to design, develop, implement, or support Computronix software solutions.
We focus on database management built on an Oracle platform and are looking for full-time developers that want to innovate, collaborate, learn, develop, and find solutions to varying programming challenges
As a member of this team, you will...
Have deep knowledge of multiple technologies (languages, tools, modules, and performance tuning).
Develop customized software for specific applications, using modern technologies such as .net, Python, Oracle SQL, and PL/SQL. Capable of working independently on most phases of software programming and require little guidance for more complex phases of development.
Design, code, test, and debug programswithminimal support from senior IT staff.
Maintainand document programs in accordance with company best-practice standards.
Be very familiar with relational database design, normalization, database links, stored procedures, triggers, views, queries, joins,etc.
Assist in converting client requirements to designs as well as the abilityto provide accurate project work estimates.
Develop solutions from detailed business and technical specifications.
Own and be involved in the planning and execution of software deployments and upgrades.
Identify the majority of risks associated with deployments.
Build out a complete design document to the full level of detail (navigation model, wireframes, workflow diagram, object model, detailed design) based on SRS requirements.
We value…
A team environment that is collaborative, open, honest, and respectful.
Asking questions, trying new things, and continually finding ways to work smarter.
You will receive...
A competitive pay scale commensurate with your skills and expertise.
A generous medical, dental, and vision benefits plan along with retirement plans.
An opportunity to grow both personally and professionally through our CX Academy.
Work/life balance is something we are really committed to, not something we just talk about. We believe you should love your work and your play.
A commitment to corporate transparency with quarterly all-company meetings.
Being part of a company that makes it their mission to respect, trust, and serve our clients and each other.
